meanings.definition: To fry quickly in a little hot fat.
meanings.sent1: She will saut the vegetables for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: The chef taught us how to saut the shrimp perfectly.
meanings.sent3: While attempting to saut the chicken, she accidentally spilled the oil.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the saut onions filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling sound of the saut food made everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A jump in ballet or other dance.
meanings.sent1: Her graceful saut across the stage impressed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The ballet dancer's saut was the highlight of the performance.
meanings.sent3: During the dance, his saut made the audience gasp in awe.
meanings.sent4: The saut of the ballerina seemed to defy gravity.
meanings.sent5: The saut in the choreography added a touch of elegance to the routine.
